text: Isorno was a municipality of the district Locarno in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. == History == The former municipality was created in 2001 by a merger of Auressio, Berzona and Loco.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 January 2010 On 10 April 2016, the former municipalities of Gresso, Isorno, Mosogno and Vergeletto merged to form the municipality of Onsernone.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 27 April 2016 == References == == Other websites == Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:2016 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Isorno
